mean_cn: adj. 顽强的，顽固的；  vt. 跟踪，尾随
mean_en: having or showing the attitude of a person who wants to do or get something and will not stop trying :stubborn and determined
word_etyma: dog跟踪，紧随 + ged过去式 → dogged 跟踪，尾随
sentence: He is dogged in his determination to be a successful businessman.
sentence_trans: 他下定决心，要成为一个成功的商人。
